title: Gearty Grilling: Alex Voorhoeve on why we need philosophers to help us question our intuitive moral judgements
itunes:author: Dr Alex Voorhoeve
description: Contributor(s): Dr Alex Voorhoeve | Alex Voorhoeve, Associate Professor in the Department of Philosophy, Logic and Scientific Method, discusses why we need philosophers to help us question our intuitive moral judgements.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Dr Alex Voorhoeve | Alex Voorhoeve, Associate Professor in the Department of Philosophy, Logic and Scientific Method, discusses why we need philosophers to help us question our intuitive moral judgements.
